snippet: Labor leaders see a ballot measure that would bar their political contributions as the biggest threat they have faced in this year of challenges to their power.
abstract: Wealthy California conservatives are championing a ballot measure that would bar unions from donating to political candidates; labor leaders see Proposition 32 as the biggest threat they have faced in a year of nationwide challenges to their power
lead_paragraph: Labor leaders see a ballot measure that would bar their political contributions as the biggest threat they have faced in this year of challenges to their power.

headline.seo: Battle Over Unions Moves to California
headline.main: California Is Latest Stage for Election Battle Over Unions
headline.print_headline: California Is Latest Stage for Election Battle Over Union Power
